<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3048</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Lexicon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Lexikon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Lexique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Léxico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Lessico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το λεξικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Léxico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The “Holocaust Resource Center” contains hundreds of documents on the subject of the Holocaust. Examples of the texts include: individuals, institutions, phenomenona, important sites, cities and eventsThe Lexicon documents provide an elementary definition of the subjects and will present basic data.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">World War II</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">archive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lexicon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">documents</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die?Holocaust Hilfsmittel-Mitte? enthält 
Hunderte Dokumente bezüglich des Holocaust. Beispiele der Texte
schließen ein: Einzelpersonen, Anstalten, phenomenona, wichtige
Sites, Städte und eventsThe Lexikondokumente stellen eine 
grundlegende Definition der Themen zur Verfügung und werden 
grundlegende Daten darstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Centre de Ressource de ?holocauste ? 
contient des centaines de documents au sujet du Holocauste. 
Les exemples des textes incluent : les individus, les 
établissements, le phenomenona, les sites importants, les villes et 
les documents de lexique d'eventsThe fournissent une définition 
élémentaire des sujets et présenteront des données de base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Centro Do Recurso Do?Holocaust? contem 
centenas dos originais no assunto do Holocaust. Os exemplos dos 
textos incluem: os indivíduos, as instituições, o 
phenomenona, os locais importantes, as cidades e os originais do 
léxico do eventsThe fornecem uma definição elementar dos assuntos e
apresentarão dados básicos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Centro Delle Risorse Del?Holocaust? 
contiene le centinaia dei documenti a proposito del Holocaust. 
Gli esempi dei testi includono: gli individui, le 
istituzioni, il phenomenona, i luoghi importanti, le città ed i 
documenti del lessico del eventsThe forniscono una definizione 
elementare degli oggetti e presenteranno i dati di base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κέντρο των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς ?Holocaust; 
περιέχει τις εκατοντάδες των εγγράφων σχετικά με το θέμα 
του ολοκαυτώματος. Τα παραδείγματα των κειμένων 
περιλαμβάνουν: τα άτομα, τα όργανα, το 
phenomenona, οι σημαντικές περιοχές, οι πόλεις και τα έγγραφα 
λεξικών eventsThe παρέχουν έναν στοιχειώδη ορισμό των θεμάτων
και θα παρουσιάσουν τα βασικά στοιχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El Centro Del Recurso Del?Holocaust? 
contiene centenares de documentos a propósito del Holocaust. 
Los ejemplos de los textos incluyen: los individuos, las 
instituciones, el phenomenona, los sitios importantes, las ciudades y 
los documentos del léxico del eventsThe proporcionan a una 
definición elemental de los temas y presentarán datos básicos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweiter Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Deuxième guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">archives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lexique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">documents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
